name: XCUIDevice
desc: A proxy that can simulate physical buttons, device orientation, and Siri interaction for an iOS, watchOS, or tvOS device.

items.name: var supportsPointerInteraction: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates if the device supports pointer interaction.

items.name: func press(XCUIDevice.Button)
items.desc: Simulates the user pressing a physical button.

items.name: enum XCUIDevice.Button
items.desc: A physical button on an iOS device.

items.name: var siriService: XCUISiriService
items.desc: An object that represents the Siri interface on the device.

items.name: func rotateDigitalCrown(delta: CGFloat)
items.desc: Simulates the user rotating the Digital Crown on an Apple Watch by the delta amount.

items.name: func rotateDigitalCrown(delta: CGFloat, velocity: XCUIGestureVelocity)
items.desc: Simulates the user rotating the Digital Crown on an Apple Watch by the delta amount and speed you provide.
